Hero: I am a front-end engineer, who

About.Title: Introduction
About.SubTitle: About Me
About.Description: I have been working in the software industry for one and a half years. Below are the technologies and tools that I am proficient in.

Journey.Title: Learning Journey
Journey.SubTitle: My experience in the software industry.

SelfTaught.Title: Self-Taught Programming
Points: Purchase Hexschool's courses to learn front-end skills through self-study.
Buy books from Tenlong Bookstore to learn JavaScript and Vue.
Learn HTML and CSS by watching Amos's tutorial videos on YouTube.

FrontEndDeveloper.Title: Front-end Developer
Points: Responsible for developing and maintaining the front-end and back-end of a food ordering website project.
Develop a reservation service and integrate Line LIFF and calendar functions to provide users with a more convenient booking experience.
Integrate JKO Pay payment system with JKO APP service to provide a more diverse payment method.
Integrate Bank SinoPac's payment system and develop a stored value service that includes QR code scanning, stored value plans, and other related services.

Relearning.Title: Relearning
Points: Purchase the Next.js course on Udemy to learn about SSR, SSG, ISR, and API Routes related knowledge.
Purchase the React course on HiSKIO to learn about React, React Router, and Redux related knowledge.
Purchase the Three.js course on Three.js Journey to learn the basics of creating 3D websites.
Learn how to create animations using Framer Motion and Anime.js by watching tutorial videos on YouTube and reading the official documentation.

Roger.Testimonial: This book club has allowed me to truly appreciate the power of collective brainstorming. Every time, I am able to hear new ideas and insights. Through this exchange and learning, I am able to accelerate my passion for learning new technologies.
Roger.Name: Roger

Jim.Testimonial: It made me realize that as long as I persist, even just a little bit, the results can be remarkable after a few months. Through the process of teaching and learning, it is easier to see my blind spots and strengths. Feedback is crucial.
Jim.Name: Jim

Karol.Testimonial: Reading clubs give me the motivation to understand unfamiliar knowledge. Through presentations, I learn how to express myself in a simple and understandable way. Listening to other members' explanations and trying to think from different perspectives is a joyful time of growth with my peers.
Karol.Name: Karol

Contact.Title: Contact Me
Contact.SubTitle: If you have any questions or ideas for me, please feel free to contact me.
